title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Elements of crystallography; symmetry-properties and relations; introduction to crystal physics; effect of symmetry on electrical, dielectric, thermal and optical properties of crystals; symmetry of higher rank tensors and their applications to crystal properties; thermodynamics of crystals; magnetic symmetry of crystal physics; some general problems of crystal physics.
